i.name: Fury of the Dragonborn
i.description: <mainText>Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.</mainText>

q.name: Twin Bite
q.description:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front of Shyvana.

w.name: Burnout
w.description:
Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.

e.name: Flame Breath
e.description:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.

r.name: Dragon's Descent
r.description:
Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.

riot.name: Fury of the Dragonborn
riot.description: <mainText>Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.</mainText>

i1.name: Fury of the Dragonborn
i1.blurb: Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Shyvana''' deals 20% '''bonus''' {{as|physical|physical damage}} and {{as|magic|magic damage}} damage to {{ui|Dragon|Dragons}} and to {{ui|Vilemaw}}.
i1.description2: Additionally, '''Shyvana''' starts with {{sti|armor|{{as|5 '''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|5 '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}, which is permanently increased by 5 for every [[Dragon|elemental drake]] ({{ui|Cloud Drake}}, {{ui|Infernal Drake}}, {{ui|Mountain Drake}}, and {{ui|Ocean Drake}}) or {{ui|Vilemaw}} her team slays.

riot.name: Twin Bite
riot.description:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front of Shyvana.
riot.tooltip:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack, dealing {{ firsthitdamagecalc }} and {{ secondhitdamagecalc }} physical damage on the first and second hits respectively.

While Twin Bite is on cooldown, basic attacks reduce the remaining cooldown duration by {{ cdreductiononhit }} seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.

Twin Bite's second hit damage is equal to {{ secondhitdamage*100 }}% of Shyvana's attack damage.

q1.name: Twin Bite
q1.blurb: Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the {{sti|cooldown}} of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds. Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shyvana's''' next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds strikes twice in one swift movement, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} and applying [[on-hit effect]]s twice.
q1.description2: ''Twin Bite'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|100% {{critical damage|100|melee}}|physical damage}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
q1.description3: '''Shyvana's''' basic attacks against non-structures reduce ''Twin Bite's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
q1.description5: {{sbc|{{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form}}:}} ''Twin Bite'' damages all enemies in a cone in front of '''Shyvana''', generating {{tip|fury}} and applying on-hit effects ''twice'' to all enemies hit.
notes: {{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form's}} ''Twin Bite'' cannot apply {{iis|Tiamat}} {{nie|Cleave}} twice per target hit ({{nie|Cleave}} has an internal {{fd|0.05}} seconds internal cooldown when applied on different targets to prevent abuse).

riot.name: Burnout
riot.description:
Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.
riot.tooltip:
Shyvana deals {{ damagepertickcalc }} magic damage per second to nearby enemies and gains a bonus {{ mspercent*100 }}% movement speed that decays over {{ baseduration }} seconds.

While Burnout is active, basic attacks deal {{ damageonhitcalc }} magic damage to nearby enemies and extend its duration by {{ bonusdurationonhit }} second.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.

Burnout has a maximum duration of {{ maxbuffduration }} seconds.

w1.name: Burnout
w1.blurb: Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout. Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shyvana''' surrounds herself in flames for 3 seconds, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to surrounding enemies each second.
w1.leveling:
{{st|Initial Movement Speed|{{ap|30 to 50}}%}}<!--
-->{{st|Magic Damage Per Second|{{ap|20 to 70}} {{as|(+ 20% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
w1.description2: Basic attacking an enemy while ''Burnout'' is active deals 25% of ''Burnout's'' damage to all enemies surrounding '''Shyvana''' and, against non-structures, extends ''Burnout's'' duration by 1 second, stacking up to for 4 times for a maximum total duration of 7 seconds.
w1.description3: {{sti|ms|{{as|'''Bonus''' movement speed}}}} decays linearly over the duration.
w1.description4: {{sbc|{{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form}}:}} ''Burnout'' has increased range, scales with {{ais|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana}} rank.
w1.effect_radius: {{tt|162.5|Human form range}} / {{tt|{{ap|350|365|380}}|Dragon form range, scales with Dragon's Descent}}
notes: * ''Burnout'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Shyvana's'' previous orders.

riot.name: Flame Breath
riot.description:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.
riot.tooltip:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that stops after hitting a champion. All enemies hit take {{ damagecalc }} magic damage and are marked for {{ markduration }} seconds.

Shyvana's basic attacks against marked targets deal {{ percenthpdamage*100 }}% of their maximum health as magic damage on hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing {{ dragonexplosioncalc }} bonus magic damage and scorching the earth for 4 seconds. Enemies on scorched earth take {{ dragondamagepertickcalc }} magic damage per second.

Flame Breath's on-hit damage against monsters is capped at {{ maxdamagevsmonsters }} damage per hit.

e1.name: Flame Breath
e1.blurb: Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit. Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shyvana''' unleashes a fireball in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit. The fireball stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, marking them for 5 seconds.
e1.leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|60 to 220}} {{as|(+ 30% AD)}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}|Empowered Magic Damage|{{pp|13|100 to 160|6 to 18|formula= 100+5 per level}} +
{{ap|60 to 220}} {{as|(+ 60% AD)}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
e1.description2: {{sbc|{{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form}}:}} ''Flame Breath'' explodes upon hitting a champion or reaching the target location, dealing increased {{as|magic damage}} to them and surrounding enemies (area radius scales with {{ais|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana}} rank) and scorching the earth for 4 seconds. Enemies standing on scorched earth take {{pp|13|60 to 120|6 to 18|formula = 60 + 5 per level|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 10% AD)}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} per second and are persistently marked.
e1.description3: '''Shyvana's''' basic attacks against marked enemies deal {{as|{{fd|3.25}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, capped at 100 against monsters.
notes: * ''Flame Breath's'' mark damage will not apply spell effects or {{sti|life steal}}.

riot.name: Dragon's Descent
riot.description:
Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.
riot.tooltip:
Active: Shyvana transforms into a dragon, gaining {{ bonushp }} Health and flying to target location. Enemies along her path take {{ damagecalc }} magic damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Passive: Shyvana generates {{ furygainpertick }} Fury every second. Basic Attacks generate {{ furygainonhit }} Fury.

r1.name: Dragon's Descent
r1.blurb: Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location. Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.
r1.description: {{sbc|Passive - Fury:}} ''Dragon's Descent'' has no cooldown or initial cost but can only be activated when '''Shyvana''' has {{tip|fury|100 fury}}. '''Shyvana''' passively generates fury per second while in human form, {{tip|fury|2 fury}} per basic attack in either form, and {{tip|fury|100 fury}} when ''Dragon's Descent'' is first learned.
r1.description2: {{sbc|Active - Dragon Form:}} '''Shyvana''' transforms into a dragon and {{tip|dashes}} {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} to the target location, {{tip|airborne|carrying}} and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies she runs through.
r1.description3: '''Shyvana's''' dragon form grants her basic attacks {{sti|range|'''bonus''' range}}, {{sti|health|{{as|'''bonus''' health}}}}, and empowered basic [[Champion ability|abilities]] at the cost of {{tip|fury|5 fury}} per second, returning to human form once depleted.
notes: * ''Dragon's Descent'' has a 20 seconds effective duration when not attacking (indefinite when attacking continuously with {{as|{{fd|2.5}} attack speed}}).

* ''Dragon's Descent'' has a {{ap|150|75|50}} seconds effective cooldown when not attacking ({{tt|{{ap|17.65|15.8|14.3}} seconds|Estimated}} when attacking continuously with {{as|{{fd|2.5}} attack speed}}).
